benefits.title: First of its kind.
benefits.problem: No other platforms provide a new community for each individual show.
benefits.solution: Find new artists, search for upcoming concerts, and share with others who appreciate the same kind of music you do all in one app!

benefits.title: A discovery process that actually works.
benefits.problem: Artist and concert suggestions don’t just take your favorite artists and genres into consideration. Our algorithm uses information from other music lovers that you Resonate with.
benefits.solution: It’s like when your friend who has really good taste in music gets handed the aux cord.

benefits.title: The community.
benefits.problem: See what plans people have for upcoming shows.
benefits.solution: Stay connected with new people you meet, whether you want to meet up with them at another show or just see new music they’ve been listening to.
